title: Not even the wicked dead
author: VD
content_html:
The first episode of Midnight’s War, NOT EVEN THE WICKED DEAD, is now available on Webtoons! It is my entry in the short story content. Rated adult for depictions of violence.

As it happens, we jumped the gun a little on the weekly Alt★Hero episode, so Episode 12 of Alt★Hero, LA SUPERMODEL, is also live now.
content_text:
The first episode of Midnight’s War,
NOT EVEN THE WICKED DEAD
, is now available on Webtoons! It is my entry in the short story content. Rated adult for depictions of violence.
As it happens, we jumped the gun a little on the weekly Alt★Hero episode, so Episode 12 of Alt★Hero,
LA SUPERMODEL
, is also live now.
